    • About Charletta Wilson


    Charletta is an industrial & organizational psychologist, Certified Mindfulness Coach, Certified Dare to Lead™ Facilitator and educator of graduate studies in leadership. For over two decades, she’s worked collaboratively with hundreds of clients in business startups, leadership development and most recent, growing ‘brave teams’. Charletta serves as an executive coach to senior leaders in government and corporations. Her passion is to help leaders grow awareness and capacity for courage and creativity which comes through CaPeesh™ .

    CaPeesh™ is a bold expression ‘You understand?!’ The beginning of wisdom, begins with understanding. At CaPeesh we help leaders understand, practice and become. We don’t just talk leadership, we show you how!

    Charletta Wilson
